summary: The document is a memorandum dated 16 June 1964, detailing the arrangements for a safehouse for AMMUG-1 at Summit Hill Apartments in Silver Spring, Maryland. It outlines the involvement of Mr. John Ryan from the Safehouse Procurement Section and Mr. Roger Shea, an attorney in Arlington, Virginia, who is to sign the lease for Vladimir Rodriguez Lahera. The memorandum mentions the placement of a deposit on an apartment, security checks, and the planned signing of the lease starting 01 July 1964.
key_findings: Arrangement for a safehouse for AMMUG-1 at Summit Hill Apartments in Silver Spring, Maryland.
Involvement of Mr. John Ryan from the Safehouse Procurement Section and Mr. Roger Shea, an attorney, in the process.
Lease to be signed for Vladimir Rodriguez Lahera starting 01 July 1964, following security checks and deposit placement.
